General.Name: Minera IRL Limited
General.Description: Minera IRL Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, development, mining, and extraction of precious metals in Latin America. The company primarily explores for gold. Its flagship project is the Ollachea Gold project located in the Puno Region of Southern Peru. The company was formerly known as Goldmin Holdings and changed its name to Minera IRL Limited in October 2006. Minera IRL Limited was incorporated in 2003 is headquartered in Lima, Peru.

1.Name: Dr. Diego Francisco Helge Pablo Christian  Benavides Norlander
1.Title: CEO & Exec. Director
